introduction.en:
StreamVault Pro is a professional-grade live stream recording and management platform built as an enhanced fork of an open-source project. This version adds advanced features including intelligent transcript management, modern UI design, and comprehensive platform support. By integrating FFmpeg and advanced stream processing technologies, it efficiently and reliably records live streams from over 40 major platforms including Douyin, TikTok, Kuaishou, Huya, Douyu, Bilibili, and more.

Developed by: tmwgsicp
introduction.zh_CN:
StreamVault Pro是一款专业级直播流录制和管理平台，基于开源项目进行增强开发。这个版本添加了高级功能，包括智能文案管理、现代化UI设计和全面的平台支持。通过集成FFmpeg和先进的流处理技术，高效、稳定地录制抖音、TikTok、快手、虎牙、斗鱼、B站等40+主流平台的直播流。

开发者：tmwgsicp

changes: Cleaned codebase for open source release
